subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hi  Brandon ,
 I received your email and as it is now you need to send me your full
names, contact address, Cell phone# and finally your nearest airport name.

This is to further the process and to know what is next and a way forward
for the delivery without any complications in the arrival of boxes to your
place.

I look forward to hearing from you. Here I attached my ID copy to you and
also a copy picture of the box .

Regards,
David.

---

Re:   Hello, This is more notification


Brandon <hs65634@***.com>

You

Hello David P. Wilson,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea about these abandoned boxes.
It's really strange that someone would just leave them behind like that.

You mentioned that the boxes contain raw cash in US currency notes, how did
you come to find out about this? And why was it declared as personal
effects?

Also, you mentioned some fees like storage clearance and Non-inspection
fee. Could you please explain more about these fees? How much are they and
why do they need to be paid?

I'm also curious about the secure shipping company agent you mentioned.
What kind of security measures do they provide for such deliveries?

As for your share from the funds, I think it's only fair that you get
compensated for your efforts. However, I'd like to know more details before
making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for your email. I must say, this is all very intriguing! The idea of abandoned boxes full of cash is quite a mystery. How did you come across these boxes? And why were they declared as personal effects?

You mentioned some fees like storage clearance and others. Could you please elaborate on these? What are the costs associated with them and why are they necessary?

I'm also interested in learning more about the secure shipping company agent you mentioned. What kind of security measures do they have in place to ensure the safe delivery of such valuable items?

As for your share from the funds, it seems only fair that you receive compensation for your efforts. However, I would appreciate more details before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:

You mentioned that the boxes contain raw cash in US currency notes. How did you come across this information? And why were the contents declared as personal effects?

I noticed you mentioned some fees such as storage clearance and delivery fee. Could you please elaborate on these charges? What are they for and how much do they amount to?

You also spoke of a secure shipping company agent. What kind of security measures do they provide for such valuable cargo?

As for your share from the funds, I believe it's only fair that you receive compensation for your efforts. However, I'd like to understand more about this arrangement before making any decisions.

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hello,
Email received and you are to send me the information required. And please,
take note that The consignments were declared as personal effects and
classified documents while in actual fact contains raw cash. US currency
notes in $100USD denominations are carefully packed and stashed in two
trunk boxes.
The electronic scanner revealed it when the package was scanned in the
airport, and also the Diplomat’s inability to pay for Non Inspection Fees
and Storage tag clearance, these are my discoveries .

I will take care of the Non inspection fee and arrange for the boxes to be
moved out of this Airport to any address of your choice Once we are in
agreement, I will employ the services of a secure shipping Company/agent
that will provide the necessary security that is required to deliver the
package to your doorstep to avoid complications.

Also I have contacted management and I was inform that only what is needed
from recipient' is clearance  this will be use for clearance and  shipment
to your doorstep with the help of Diplomat direct to you within 72hours
upon the cost to avoid any delay or hindrance, this consignment should have
been repatriated  Back if not my effort and Director in  Airport whose dim
feet to make sure it declare to deliver to the owner for further details.

Therefore, all communication must be held extremely confidential to avoid
complication and what is going to be my compensation from you when you
receive these boxes?.

I wait to hear from you very urgently for a way forward.
Regards,
David.

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for your detailed message. It sounds like a complex situation with the trunk boxes and the US currency notes. I'm curious, how did you come across these boxes? And why were they declared as personal effects and classified documents?

I understand that there are some fees involved for Non Inspection and Storage tag clearance. Could you please explain more about these fees? How much are they typically?

You mentioned employing the services of a secure shipping company agent. That sounds like a good idea to ensure the safety of the package. Do you have any particular company in mind?

Also, I'm not quite clear on what is needed from me regarding clearance. Could you elaborate on this process?

Lastly, you asked about my share when I receive these boxes. Well, I would need more information before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
The clearance and fee , I can't say until the processes are processed. I
will say the boxes were declared personal effect to avoid diversion by the
Shipping Agent,

As it stands now, you have to reconfirm your Full name, Phone Number, full
address so I can cross-check and see if it corresponds with the one on the
official documents. It is now left to you to decide if you still need the
consignment or allow us to retrieve or finally cancelled

Like I did say again, the shipper abandoned it and ran away most
importantly because he gave a false declaration, he could not pay for the
yellow tag, he could not secure a valid non inspection document(s), etc. I
am ready to assist you in any way I can for you to get back this package
provided you will also give me something out of it (financial
gratification).

You can either come in person, or you engage the services of a secure
shipping/delivery Company/agent that will provide the necessary security.
That is required to deliver the package to your doorstep or the destination
of your choice.

I need all the guarantees that I can get from you before I can get involved
in this project. Please Reply  with reconfirmation of your Full Name, Home
Address, City, State and Telephone number.

Waiting for your reply.
Regards,
David.

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting situation, isn't it? I'm curious about a few things though. 

Firstly, could you explain more about the process of declaring boxes as personal effects? How does that work exactly?

Secondly, you mentioned something about a yellow tag and a non-inspection document. Could you elaborate on what these are and why they're important?

Lastly, I'm intrigued by the idea of engaging the services of a secure shipping delivery company. Could you recommend any reputable ones?

I appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: Re: This is more notification for the boxes
body:
Hello,
Email received and I understand your fear but I am here to work with you
for the delivery of the boxes to you without any delays. Take note, the
boxes/funds could be for your inheritance through someone and something
came up, so many funds are unclaimed today based on one reason or another,
and if not that the formal agent abandoned these boxes.

There is no way I could have known so don't fear okay I am here for you and
with you. As it is now you need to send me your full names, contact
address, cell phone# and finally the name of your nearest airport. I will
try my best for the delivery.

This arrangement is between me and you and MUST be kept strictly
confidential and what is our share % ? Please, confirm to me to enable me
to proceed and to secure the necessary and security things that are
required to deliver the package to your doorstep without any complications.

Thank you and Regards,
David.

At this juncture, feel free to tearm up with me to achieve this great

My regards,
David P. Wilson.
